2024-25-term-1.title: Skill Development Program on Data Analytics
2024-25-term-1.description: Comprehensive Skill Development Program on Data Analytics conducted by internal faculty and industry expert Ms. Swati Joshi from Deutsche Bank. Equipped over 90 students with practical knowledge on data analytics techniques and tools.

2024-25-term-1.title: Growing Green: Community Plants for a Brighter Future
2024-25-term-1.description: Tree plantation drive at Green Sunrise Hills, Wagholi. Students planted Jamun saplings to promote sustainability, improve air quality, and support biodiversity.

2024-25-term-1.title: Bridge to Careers: Accenture Recruitment Talk
2024-25-term-1.description: Training and Placement session focusing on Accenture recruitment process. Approximately 70 B.Tech students benefited from insights on recruitment procedures and preparation strategies.

2024-25-term-1.title: Code Conquer: A Key for Placements
2024-25-term-1.description: Interactive alumni session with Mr. Pavan Patel (Software Development Engineer at Jade Global). Guidance on career preparation, data structures, and resources like LeetCode, HackerRank, and Codeforces.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Session on Copyright, Patent, Project Sponsorship & Writing Research Articles
2024-25-term-1.description: Session covering B.Tech project requirements including copyright, patents, sponsorship, research article writing, and plagiarism checks using Turnitin. Around 15+ project groups benefited.

2024-25-term-1.title: IBM Training: Cloud Computing, Data Analytics, and AI
2024-25-term-1.description: Three-day comprehensive IBM training program under IETE and ISTE. Covered cloud computing, data analytics, machine learning, deep learning, and hands-on sessions using IBM Cloud platforms. 60 second-year students participated.

2024-25-term-1.title: Mastering UML: Blueprint for Clear & Effective System Design
2024-25-term-1.description: Session on UML fundamentals and advanced concepts. Covered structural and behavioral diagrams, system design, and popular UML tools like StarUML, ArgoUML, and Visual Paradigm. 80 third-year students participated.

2024-25-term-1.title: Ignite Your GRE Ambition - GRE Mock Test
2024-25-term-1.description: GRE Mock Test replicating actual GRE format. Sponsored by Mr. Aditya Chaudhari (Atencion Media). Around 200 students from various disciplines participated and gained insights into time management and preparation strategies.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Lecture: Pathway to GRE/GMAT Excellence
2024-25-term-1.description: Expert guidance session by Mr. Nitin Lathe (Senior Faculty at IMFS) on GRE, GMAT, SAT, TOEFL, and IELTS. Shared effective strategies on study planning, time management, and building strong academic profiles. 170 students benefited.

2024-25-term-1.title: Dashboard-Making Competition
2024-25-term-1.description: Dashboard-Making Competition under ISTE with categories for Best Overall Design, Most Innovative, and Best Interactive Features. 71 students participated. Winners: Sampada Payas (MCA), Tejas Borle (CS-AIML), Yash Kute (SY IT-C).

2024-25-term-1.title: Workshop on Dive into GitHub: A Practical Workshop
2024-25-term-1.description: Practical GitHub workshop conducted by Mr. Govind Hivrale (DevOps Engineer at BMC Software, alumnus 2020-21). Covered Git basics, repositories, branches, pulls requests, and hands-on collaboration exercises. 131 students participated.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Lecture: Achieving Educational Excellence Through OBE
2024-25-term-1.description: Expert lecture by Dr. Anil Sahu (Dean of PhD at GHRCEM) on Outcome-Based Education (OBE). Explained learner-centric approach, Course Outcomes, and Program Outcomes. 58 aspiring students attended.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industry Visit to Radiant IT Services Pvt. Ltd., Pune
2024-25-term-1.description: Industry visit for second-year students (44 participants) to explore web and full-stack development. MoU signed for expert sessions, workshops, and internships to strengthen academia-industry collaboration.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Guidance Session on Smart India Hackathon 2024
2024-25-term-1.description: SIH 2024 guidance session by Dr. Swapnil Mahajan (Head of Innovation & Incubation) and Ms. Samruddhi Dhamdhere (SIH 2022 finalist, alumnus). Shared insights on innovation, teamwork, and project development. 124 students benefited.

2024-25-term-1.title: Higher Studies in USA: Guidance to Receive 100% Scholarship
2024-25-term-1.description: Session on higher education opportunities in USA. Mr. Subhash Pol (Business Development Manager, Edwise International) guided 87 students on standardized tests (GRE, GMAT, SAT, TOEFL, IELTS) and application strategies.

2024-25-term-1.title: Parents Teacher Meet
2024-25-term-1.description: Interactive Parent-Teacher Meet with 34 parents participating. Discussion on department Vision, Mission, PEOs, POs, placements, and student activities. Ms. Surbhi Pranav (Student Counselor) shared insights on student well-being.

2024-25-term-1.title: Teacher's Day Celebration
2024-25-term-1.description: Teacher's Day celebration featuring ribbon-cutting, welcome speech, token appreciation, student speeches, cake-cutting ceremony, and fun activities. Dr. Poonam Gupta and Dr. R. D. Kharadkar participated.

2024-25-term-1.title: Blind Coding Contest: Mastering the Art of Code Without Seeing
2024-25-term-1.description: Blind Coding competition with 230 participants in three progressive rounds: MCQ (30 questions on algorithms), Average Coding (3 problems), and Blind Coding (coding without compiler). Top performers recognized for coding talent.

2024-25-term-1.title: DSY Induction Program
2024-25-term-1.description: Induction program for DSY students introducing department Vision, Mission, curriculum, research initiatives, facilities, and student activities. 26 DSY students participated. Coordinated by Mr. Dnyandeo Khemnar.

2024-25-term-1.title: Monogram Designing Competition cum Exhibition
2024-25-term-1.description: Monogram Designing Competition with 43 students showcasing creative designs reflecting department identity. Judged by alumnus Mr. Omkar Raut. 9 best designs (8 for labs, 1 for department) will be copyrighted.

2024-25-term-1.title: Eureka Idea Pitching Competition
2024-25-term-1.description: Eureka Idea Pitching Competition under E-Cell with 51 students from various departments. Focus on effective communication, value proposition, passion, and visual aids. Evaluated by Mr. Omkar Raut (Tech Mahindra).

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Lecture on OOP and DSA
2024-25-term-1.description: Expert lecture on Object-Oriented Programming and Data Structures under CSI banner. Focused on OOP principles and key data structures. 40 SY students participated with career guidance shared.

2024-25-term-1.title: Workshop on Build Your Own AI Avatar
2024-25-term-1.description: Hands-on workshop on AI avatar creation under IEEE and NxtWave Pvt. Ltd. 65 students explored AI concepts and designed custom AI avatars. Resource person: Mr. Abhinav Devaguptapu (NxtWave).

2024-25-term-1.title: Career Opportunities after B.Tech and Competitive Exams
2024-25-term-1.description: Session on diverse career paths after B.Tech by Mr. Kaushik Agastyaraj (Faculty at ACE). Covered software development, core engineering, higher studies, GATE, IES, and PSU exams. 70 students participated.

2024-25-term-1.title: AMCAT Conquered - Strategies for High Scores
2024-25-term-1.description: AMCAT preparation test for B.Tech students with 310 participants. Training and Placement Cell session highlighting career opportunities after AMCAT and effective exam strategies.

2024-25-term-1.title: Guest Lecture on GenAI – Hype or Reality
2024-25-term-1.description: Guest lecture by Mr. Mihir Nanal (Managing Director, Accenture) on Generative AI potential, challenges, and ethical implications. Discussed real-world impact and responsible AI development. 60 TY students attended.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Lecture on Community Detection Algorithms
2024-25-term-1.description: Online expert lecture by Dr. Sumit Kumar Gupta (IIIT Pune) on community detection algorithms in complex networks. Covered modularity-based, hierarchical, and statistical methods with applications in social networks and cybersecurity. 143 students attended.

2024-25-term-1.title: Educational Tour to Bhau Institute (COEP)
2024-25-term-1.description: Educational tour to COEP's Bhau Institute of Innovation, Entrepreneurship, and Leadership. 27 students gained exposure to innovation processes, incubation facilities, and entrepreneurial pathways.

2024-25-term-1.title: Ideathon 2024 - ICT Academy, Capgemini, and Barclays Bank
2024-25-term-1.description: Ideathon 2024 with 10 GHRCEM teams reaching finals among 106 registered teams. Winning team 'New Gen Innovators' secured 1st Prize (₹1,00,000), followed by 'Concept Crew' (₹75,000) and 'Power Rangers 2.0' (₹25,000).

2023-24.title: Annual Tech Fest 2023
2023-24.description: Annual technology festival featuring coding challenges, tech talks, and networking events.
